titles.title: For the private relief of Ruth Hairston by waiver of a filing deadline for appeal from a ruling relating to her application for a survivor annuity.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Reported by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 105-479.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 9.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.
Referred to Subcommittee on International Security.

committee.subcommittee: International Security, Proliferation and Federal Services
committee.name: Senate Governmental Affairs

bill.summary: 10/23/1997--Introduced. Waives the 30-day filing deadline with respect to a petition by a named individual for judicial review of a final order issued by the Merit Systems Protection Board concerning a survivor annuity.
